name: Hentai vs Evil
description:
Hentai vs Evil is an action shooter game where you will fight against evil demons which turned people into zombies. You can save anime girls from the cages to make them join you. Play as cute anime girls. Find secret objects. Save the world from the dangerous evil forces!

Features:

  • You can choose from three playable characters. They all are customizable.
  • You will play on three different locations.
  • Use various types of avaliable weapons to survive against evil forces!
  • Enjoyable shooting gameplay.
